topics.body:
You know since we're RPing as fantasy characters I realized something; most people here and in fact most people in general while they say they would like to live in a world like their favorite franchise don't actually mean that.

Trashboat would you really want to live in a world where Shocker is constantly endangering lives or pokemon fans want to live in a world that is in constant threat of annihilation from terrorist groups or be a wizard during the reign of Voldemort where muggleborns are executed and I'm pretty damn sure no one would want to live in attack on titan, hunger games or the walking dead.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a7d61b6368722bd5ba0100#post_53a7d61b6368722bd5ba0100
I think we can all agree, though, that it's not a bad thing to legitimately desire to live in Equestria.
topics.author: 4fde0c7e945b706cc30003eb

topics.body:
"@CogWeaver":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a7d73463687230ee8e0000#post_53a7d73463687230ee8e0000
I'd still want to live in Gensokyo(touhou). . . Just stay the hell away from the magic forest unless you want the bad kind of tentacle rape and make as many youkai friends as possible so you have blackup if someone wants your ass.


But I find it kind of stupid when someone says they want to live in Fallout or something stupid like that.  Yeah; enjoy getting shot or dying by radiation.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a7d61b6368722bd5ba0100#post_53a7d61b6368722bd5ba0100
Endangering nothing, Shocker has Flat out many characters on screen

I probably wouldn't actually like it very much (The showa Riders did show that Being a Rider is suffering, No longer being completely human, And Having an entire organization after your head)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a7d88663687230c9420100#post_53a7d88663687230c9420100
Yeah; as much as I like Touhou if I it were real and I was there I would for the love of fucking god stay away from Rin or half of the characters I like for fear of radiation poisoning or getting eaten by Rumia or such.  I would probably spend most of my time hanging out with the final bosses and not straying more than ten feet from them out of, "Oh god; if I run into Rumia I'm dead(Rumia is a character from Touhou that eats people from the outside often.  Basically everyone else you have a chance to reason with; her on the other hand you're totally dead)".  Imagine getting eaten by a level 1 boss from a video game; that would be a humiliating death.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

I think I get what you're talking about

I'd say that It'd probably be much worse to live as a Civilian in a Heisei rider world, There is a chance that you won't be affected by the actions of Shocker/Destron/G.O.D/Geddon/Black satan/Neo Shocker/Dogma/Golgom/Crisis, However, Your chances would be far slimmer of not being affected by the actions of the Monsters of the mirror world, Or The Worm
